./VulnDB/RDBO/Message.pm

  • package VulnDB::RDBO::Message
  • EOF
   1 package VulnDB::RDBO::Message;
   2 
   3 use strict;
   4 
   5 use base qw(VulnDB::RDBO);
   6 
   7 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
   8     table   => 'message',
   9 
  10     columns => [
  11         id              => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  12         text            => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
  13         subject         => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 250, not_null => 1 },
  14         body            => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
  15         message_type_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  16         source_id       => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  17         is_processed    => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  18         is_mailed       => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  19     ],
  20 
  21     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
  22 
  23     foreign_keys => [
  24         message_type => {
  25             class       => 'VulnDB::RDBO::MessageType',
  26             key_columns => { message_type_id => 'id' },
  27         },
  28 
  29         source => {
  30             class       => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Source',
  31             key_columns => { source_id => 'id' },
  32         },
  33     ],
  34 
  35     relationships => [
  36         advisory => {
  37             class      => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Advisory',
  38             column_map => { id => 'message_id' },
  39             type       => 'one to many',
  40         },
  41 
  42         userprofiles => {
  43             column_map    => { message_id => 'id' },
  44             foreign_class => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserProfile',
  45             map_class     => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserMessage',
  46             map_from      => 'message',
  47             map_to        => 'userprofile',
  48             type          => 'many to many',
  49         },
  50     ],
  51 );
  52 
  53 1;
